attributes.description: This is a 2022 Toyota Corolla Cross 1.8 Hybrid XS, this vehicle is more than just a vehicle, it’s more than just new technologies; it’s more than beauty; it’s a vehicle ready for adventures. The interior features includes power steering, multi-functioning steering, electric windows, electric mirrors, front electric seats, radio/CD/USB input, air conditioning, 17 inch wheels, keyless entry/start, rear camera, front/rear pdc, Bluetooth, xenon lights, climate/cruise control, leather seats/steering wheel,. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client are highly appreciated. Thank you for choosing Crescent Car Sales. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
